name: Accel Magician Mimi
description:
Girls fight with magic!
Magical girl mimi is return.
A mysterious world action game!


The game is easy to operate.
You can play with direction button and two buttons.
Please see the following for the operation method.



Direction: move
X: Attack
A: crouch



Feature:
・Smooth animation
・magic
・Action games
・16 bit graphics
